content.webTitle: Pick of the week: Central: Classical Music and Opera

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Classical Music and Opera
fields.bodyText: American Pioneers CBSO Centre, Birmingham, Sun 26 Apr Peter Wiegold's BCMG programme takes in works from Cowell and Ives to Cage and Brant. Charles Dutoit Royal Concert Hall, Nottingham, Tue 28th The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra's newly installed music director conducts Berlioz, Ravel and Prokoﬁev. Requiem Canticles Symphony Hall, Birmingham, Thu 28 Apr Jac van Steen adds Stravinsky's piece to CBSO's Igorfest.
